sn45.29:1.6: The noble eightfold path should be developed to completely understand these three feelings.
sn45.29:1.7: What is the noble eightfold path?
sn45.29:1.8: It is right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
sn45.29:1.9: This noble eightfold path should be developed to completely understand these three feelings.”
